creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: five-level blue and white castle tower on top of hill in background, center; rosy sky; green farmland in middle ground; trees and foliage in foreground
marks: Left: [昭和拾七年作  白鷺城] {Shōwa jūshichinen saku, ???? LRC: [遠志] {Tōshi}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Shirasagi Castle
